trans-unit.source: A compiled distribution of the MPIR library was also available at: http://www.holoborodko.com/pavel/mpfr/#download To use it, download the MPFR-MPIR-x86-x64-MSVC2010.zip file and extract mpir from the ZIP file to this directory.
trans-unit.target: 在MPIR库的编译分布也可在： http://www.holoborodko.com/pavel/mpfr/#download 要使用它，下载 MPFR-MPIR-x86-x64-MSVC2010.zip 文件和提取 mpir 从ZIP文件到此目录。

trans-unit.source: A list of available wheel files is available at: https://pypi.org/project/BiEntropy/#files
trans-unit.target: 可用的滚轮文件列表位于：https : //pypi.org/project/BiEntropy/#files

trans-unit.source: According to the paper, BiEntropy is "a simple algorithm which computes the approximate entropy of a finite binary string of arbitrary length" using "a weighted average of the Shannon Entropies of the string and all but the last binary derivative of the string." In other words, these metrics can be used to help assess the disorder or randomness of binary or byte strings, particularly those that are too short for other randomness tests.
trans-unit.target: 根据该论文,BiEntropy是 "一种简单的算法,它使用 "字符串的香农熵和除字符串最后一个二进制导数外的所有二进制导数的加权平均值,计算任意长度的有限二进制字符串的近似熵"。换句话说,这些指标可以用来帮助评估二进制或字节字符串的无序性或随机性,特别是那些对于其他随机性测试来说太短的字符串。

trans-unit.source: According to the paper, the "BiEntropy algorithm evaluates the order and disorder of a binary string of length n in O(n^2) time using O(n) memory." In other words, the run time has quadratic growth and the memory requirement has linear growth with respect to the string length.
trans-unit.target: 根据该论文,"BiEntropy算法使用O(n)内存在O(n^2)时间内评估长度为n的二进制字符串的顺序和乱序"。换句话说,运行时间有二次方增长,内存需求相对于字符串长度有线性增长。

trans-unit.source: Compiling GMP on Microsoft Windows is only supported under Cygwin, MinGW or DJGPP. However, this package can be compiled with MPIR, a fork of GMP, on Windows. The source for MPIR is available at http://mpir.org/ The setup.py script expects the header files, library files and DLL to be available under mpir/dll/x64/Release.
trans-unit.target: 仅在Cygwin，MinGW或DJGPP下支持在Microsoft Windows上编译GMP。但是，可以在Windows上使用MPIR（GMP的分支）来编译此程序包。对于MPIR源可在http://mpir.org/ 的 setup.py 脚本预计的头文件，库文件和DLL是可用下 mpir/dll/x64/Release 。

trans-unit.source: The GMP library and headers need to be installed before compiling.
trans-unit.target: 在GMP库和头文件需要在编译之前进行安装。

trans-unit.source: The bien and tbien functions support inputs of both binary (i.e., not unicode) strings and object types, such as those provided by the bitstring package, that have both a tobytes() method that returns a binary string and a len() method that returns the length in bits.
trans-unit.target: 的 bien 和 tbien 函数支持二进制的输入（即，不是Unicode）字符串和对象类型，比如那些通过所提供的 bitstring 包，同时具有一个 tobytes() 方法返回一个二进制串和 len() 方法，该方法返回以位为单位的长度。

trans-unit.source: The following is a table of speed-ups from the Python to the C implementation for various string byte lengths:
trans-unit.target: 下面是一张从Python到C实现的各种字符串字节长度的加速表。

trans-unit.source: The metrics are implemented in Python using the 'bitstring' package for handling arbitrary length binary strings and in native C using the GNU Multiple Precision (GMP) arithmetic library.
trans-unit.target: 在Python中使用'bitstring'包来处理任意长度的二进制字符串,在原生C语言中使用GNU多精度(GMP)算术库来实现度量。

trans-unit.source: The source code for the bientropy package can be cloned or downloaded from:
trans-unit.target: 可以从以下位置克隆或下载 bientropy 包的源代码：

trans-unit.source: Then, use setup.py to compile and install the package:
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用 setup.py 编译并安装该软件包：

trans-unit.source: This Python package provides high-performance implementations of the functions and examples presented in "BiEntropy - The Approximate Entropy of a Finite Binary String" by Grenville J. Croll, presented at ANPA 34 in 2013. https://arxiv.org/abs/1305.0954
trans-unit.target: 这个Python包提供的在“BiEntropy -有限二进制串的近似熵”颁发的功能和实施例高性能实现由格林威尔J.克罗尔，于2013年在ANPA 34呈现 https://arxiv.org/abs/ 1305.0954

trans-unit.source: This module includes both a Python C extension and a pure Python module implementing the BiEn and TBiEn metrics from the paper, as well as a suite of tests that verify their correctness. These implementations are available under the submodules 'cbientropy' and 'pybientropy'.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块包括一个Python C扩展和一个纯Python模块,实现了论文中的BiEn和TBiEn指标,以及一套验证其正确性的测试。这些实现可以在子模块'cbientropy'和'pybientropy'中找到。

trans-unit.source: This package includes a C extension which has to be compiled for each platform. Python wheels include compiled binary code and allow the extension to be installed without requiring a compiler.
trans-unit.target: 这个包包括一个C扩展,它必须为每个平台编译。Python轮子包含编译后的二进制代码,允许在不需要编译器的情况下安装扩展。

trans-unit.source: This package is tested with Python versions 2.7, 3.4, 3.5 and 3.6.
trans-unit.target: 这个软件包是在Python 2.7、3.4、3.5和3.6版本下测试的。

trans-unit.source: This package, consisting of the C implementations, Python implementations and Python bindings were written by Ryan Helinski rhelins@sandia.gov.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包由C实现，Python实现和Python绑定组成，由Ryan Helinski rhelins@sandia.gov编写。
